DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind study evaluate safety efficacy LIPO-202 reduction central abdominal bulge obese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study LIPO-202 Reduction Central Abdominal Bulging Obese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male nonpregnant female subject Capable provide write consent BMI > 30 kg/m2 < 40 kg/m2 Stable diet exercise routine At least `` Slightly Dissatisfied '' abdominal bulge Abdominal Contour Questionnaire ( ACQ ) BMI > 40 kg/m2 Have treatment fat around abdomen , include surgical procedure ( tummy tuck , liposuction ) , injection fat loss treatment device reduce fat abdomen . Plan start weight loss exercise program study Known hypersensitivity study drug Have medical condition might complicate study procedure
